title: BitcoinMoses
author: BitcoinMoses
content: You can directly ask question to Dr¬† Craig Steven Wright in this thread. He might answer to your question in this thread or he might reply you with private message. My First Questions to CSW - 1. Are you an honest person as you claim to be a pastor ?2. Why are you claiming that you have invented the¬† Bitcoin Blockchain ?¬† 3. Is it because you have been hired by others and push you forward to dox you as Satoshi Nakamoto ? 4. You said on BBC interview in May 2016 that you do not want money, you do not want fame and adoration, so why are trying hard through the court cases to find a way grab Satoshi's mined Coin ? 5. Can you prove in any way that you have designed and built the Blockchain ?

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.created_time: September 17, 2022, 09:19:10 AMLast edit: September 17, 2022, 10:41:17 AM by Charles-Tim
comments.body: Claiming to be Satoshi, not supporting Hodlonaut, nor Craig Wright. Now asking people to ask Craig Wright question directly from here.You do not have to waste your time on this troll Faketoshi. I will advice people to ignor the him. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=955818

comments.author: odolvlobo
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinMoses on September 17, 2022, 08:59:26 AMYou can directly ask question to Dr ¬†Craig Steven Wright in this thread.Honestly, I don't think there is any question that could be asked that will get an honest answer. You just can't believe anything he says, whether it is true or not. The lies and fraudulent acts are numerous and well-documented, and completely destroy any credibility that he might have once had.

Bitcoin Noble Prize Award Project - 2018

comments.author: Sandra_hakeem
comments.body: These isn't about some ambitious Craig wright, this is about you.Your personal text is invariably postulating that you are SATOSHI? or what?You're against Craig cus you're the real faketoshi I guess now, ain't you? Look, why don't you just keep your questions to yourself? I mean sit on a cushion and ask yourself the same questions you are throwing at Craig then you'll realize you both are degenerates.Sandra üë©‚Äçü¶±

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: I believe Op is just one delusional, confused, and depressed person who has taken to the internet to start trolling others, Claiming to be Satoshi. I almost had a brain seizure going through Op's post history. Quote from: BitcoinMoses on November 14, 2017, 08:10:41 PMHello Bitcoin Forum ! Today I announce the true identity of Satoshi Nakamoto the pseudonymous inventor of Bitcoin and Blockchain Technology. His true identity and brand name is Thomas Phellen. Thomas Phellen invented Bitcoin and Blockchain technology in early May 2007.Quote from: BitcoinMoses on December 27, 2017, 09:44:29 PMSatoshi Nakamoto is actually Theymos. Theymos is actually the impostor of real Satoshi Nakamoto. He is literally an Artificial Intelligence. Satoshi Nakamoto is 'Bitcoin Jesus'  Roger Ver the impostor has pickpocketed the second coming of Jesus Christ's title 'Bitcoin Jesus' from Satoshi Nakamoto.Quote from: BitcoinMoses on May 12, 2022, 06:49:29 PMYou are saying Satoshi Nakamoto is one of the great mind. But you need to know, that Satoshi Nakamoto is my Pseudonym. Theymos is also my pseudonym. When I am Satoshi Nakamoto, how can I am trying to steal my own pseudonym ?Quote from: BitcoinMoses on March 28, 2022, 01:06:41 PMYes, you can claim to be Satoshi Nakamoto. Please make your claim today and get free ticket to attend Coinbase Summit 2022. I am going to give free ticket to 32 Satoshi Candidates to attend the Coinbase Summit in London. Quote from: bitcoinmoses 25th December, 2018.Today is Christmas but very few Christians knows that Jesus was born on 13 April -4 AD.Today is the 'Happy Birthday of Satoshi Nakamoto'.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5083789.msg48882398#msg48882398Quote from: BitcoinMoses on September 29, 2019, 03:19:37 PMSatoshi Nakamoto himself has decided to reveal his true identity on his Japanese Birthday this year in Bangkok on the 5 April 2019. Oops!! did you forget your line? I thought we were supposed to use December 25th as satoshi's birthday.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: I don't want to ask a lot of questions, just want to ask thishow much profit do you get after you admit that you are satoshi and when will you move all your bitcoins to an exchange wallet and sell all your bitcoins

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Question to you, why are you curious about Faketoshi? How do you know he will answer your question? I don't want to ask anything Faketoshi. It's because he is a fake person and I am not interested to waste time with him. Satoshi Nakamoto doesn't need to fight hard to prove ownership. He can prove simply at any time.

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: bitcoin moses and digital monk are the same person with 2 accountshe is trying desperately on both accounts to make himself someone associated with prominent figures of bitcoin so he can ask questions and garner info and hen sell his pretend story/info to media. aswell as try other stuff.. he is a wannabe CSW.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: My question to Craig Wright is this...If satoshi lost the keys to his coins, does he deserve to get them back?¬† If so, should everyone who has misplaced their keys be able to go through a process to get access to their coins?¬† If so, what should the process be for this recovery, who will be in charge of it, will they be paid, and how will this be verified as honest?Also, bonus question...¬† When you realized that you couldn't get the Bitcoin community to give you satoshi's coins, then you supported the BCH fork and realized Roger wasn't going to support this either, were you concerned that another fork would lose you the needed support to unlock the coins and at what point are the BSV coins so worthless that you abandon this "I am satoshi, give me his coins" nonsense?

Bitcoin Noble Prize Award Project - 2018Good find. This is nothing but luck trying to make baseless claims to be an important figure.

comments.body: as for a question for CSWknowing he wants to manipulate and lie.. a very simple question1+1=?

comments.author: kryptqnick
comments.body: I don't have questions to Craig. He is an arrogant rich guy who is used to having it his way and, apparently, enjoys making lives of others harder with his copyright notices and claims he makes. He can't prove anything because he's not Satoshi, and there have been years for him to prove otherwise. My question is to judges: why is this guy still enjoying freedom despite failing to meet court's requirements and making false statements in court?

He might answer to your question in this thread or he might reply you with private message. My First Questions to CSW - 1. Are you an honest person as you claim to be a pastor ?2. You're really making funds but I will want to see your next thread to which your questions were answered by CSW.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.created_time: September 18, 2022, 03:51:19 PMLast edit: September 18, 2022, 04:24:17 PM by CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinMoses on September 17, 2022, 08:59:26 AMYou can directly ask question to Dr ¬†Craig Steven Wright in this thread. He might answer to your question in this thread or he might reply you with private message. What proof is it that the replies we will be getting from this thread is actually Mr. Craig Wright #FakeSatoshi, because I doubt if he is on this forum, or probably does he knows about this forum. To me, non of these questions listed above really matter, because if I'm to ask just only one single question, it will be "Why is it after claiming to have had the private key to Satoshi's wallet with 1 million Bitcoins, when asked in court couldn't present any viable answer? Because having a glance through this article published few days ago, Craig Wright told a Norwegian court on Wednesday that he ‚Äústomped on the hard drive‚Äù that contained the ‚Äúkey slices‚Äù required to grant him access to Satoshi Nakamoto‚Äôs private keys, making it ‚Äúincredibly difficult‚Äù to cryptographically prove he is the creator of Bitcoin, and later contradicting himself saying that Satoshi never had 1.1 million BTC but it was stollen, which he is here to recover it from the thieves, of and that can be done by court order...For more detalls, check the linkhttps://www.google.com/amp/s/www.coindesk.com/policy/2022/09/15/craig-wright-tells-court-he-stomped-on-the-hard-drive-containing-satoshi-wallet-keys/%3foutputType=amp

comments.author: BitcoinMoses
comments.body: If you are a botcoiner and have faith in Bitcoin, you have the rights and responsibilities to defend Bitcoin from any crooks or thieves or hackers trying to break the Bitcoin or trying to damage the good reputation of Bitcoin then you must take action. Ask 10,000 questions to CSW. ¬†Organise conference to cross examine him and invite Bitcoin Moses to attend the Faketoshi Converence. Believe me you all will be able to deal with any Faketoshi problem. There is a honourable Bitcoin member name franky1 who think that I am Bitcoin Moses also a Faketoshi and scammer, so I will prove in the conference if whether I am faketoshi or Satoshi. I even do not need the Genesis Block private key to prove my identity but I can do it feronsically plus with other mean. In order to protect Bitcoin from the Bitcoin Gremlins I might have to first reveal the Identity of Theymos and Franky1 first.

comments.body: This is total nonsensical and not acceptable. This does not hold any water. How can I be sure he is not lying again. He claims is a pastor but the gravity of his lies are insurmountable. I rather keep mute than learning from a cronic lier.¬† He's just a shamble and loser.
